description: This file defines the NoteViewActivity class, an Android activity used for viewing a note's details within the Notes app. It displays note title and content, and provides buttons to edit the note or go back.

classes.name: NoteViewActivity
classes.description: Android activity for displaying a note, allowing editing and returning to the previous screen.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets layout, binds views, retrieves the note object from intent, and sets up button click listeners.
